io.vertx.rxjava.sqlclient

Class SqlConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.rxjava.sqlclient.SqlClient
      • io.vertx.rxjava.sqlclient.SqlConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DB2Connection, MSSQLConnection, MySQLConnection, PgConnection

    public class SqlConnection
extends SqlClient
    A connection to the database server.

      • begin

        public void begin(Handler<AsyncResult<Transaction>> handler)
        Begin a transaction and returns a Transaction for controlling and tracking this transaction.

        When the connection is explicitely closed, any inflight transaction is rollbacked.

        Parameters:
        handler -
